column1: .@StopBigMoney has released their first legislative scorecard and I'm incredibly proud to receive an "A" rating for my efforts to end corruption in Washington.  We need a government that works for all of us not special interests. https://t.co/2aEOTzQFYy

Today thousands of Long Islanders of all faiths and backgrounds came together to march in solidarity with our Jewish neighbors. I was proud to be one of them.  Hate and anti-Semitism have no place here. #OneLongIsland https://t.co/uFvJYAFrI7

This Sunday I’ll be joining @NassauExecutive @SteveBellone and Long Islanders of all faiths to march in solidarity with our Jewish neighbors.  Together we will send a clear message that hate and anti-Semitism have no place in our community or our country. Hope to see you there. https://t.co/kymwEzV8vx

I'm excited to announce my support for @PeteButtigieg! Pete represents the new voice and fresh perspective that we need in Washington. He's focused on bold yet commonsense policies that will unite our country. And he has what it takes to beat Donald Trump. https://t.co/H2QqIps4Mk

On this #ElectionDay I'm proud to support candidates who are going to fight for hardworking families here in Nassau County. Candidates like @LauraAGillen @BurnsforLD6 @debra4nassauleg Jill Levine and Thomas Tweedy.  We need their leadership now more than ever! https://t.co/zrnqlnLGMn

It's #ElectionDay in New York and we have a lot of important local races on the ballot!  I just voted – make sure you find a time today to do the same!  If you don't already know your polling place you can find it here: https://t.co/zdcGhyTfoh https://t.co/lYaY3pHqJT

Give me a break.  Our background checks bill has been sitting on McConnell’s desk for 200+ days.  The NRA has thwarted every effort at gun violence reform for decades.  And Trump has walked back every commitment he's ever made on this issue.  So you tell me who isn't helping. https://t.co/MyxoxBUQIx
Please join me and U.S. Senator @kyrstensinema at this year's Annual Women's Luncheon!   Hope to see you there!   Tickets available here: https://t.co/mH2qIFxbPH https://t.co/rRuXPoSq3k
Excited to have my good friend @kyrstensinema join us as our guest speaker at this year's Women's Luncheon.  Hope to see you there! https://t.co/PcENrKvOAF

I’m proud to endorse my friend @BetoORourke for President!  He’s honest authentic and has the courage of his convictions and a bold vision for our future. Most importantly he'll build a movement that will rise above the toxic division in our politics and unite this country.
Thanks so much for stepping up and leading this effort! Long Island is lucky to have the @NassauYDs in its corner! https://t.co/x2TjgbPF3k
